#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

In the Tx side, I use only a 270Ohm resistor in the pin10 output connected to the Video Tx audio in.

On the Rx side, I had to use an opamp (LM358) to adapt the voltage levels to the needs of the arduino board (pin2)
